ygData.subject: Re: Newbie needs some help
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool. I ve never had any animals help me except for charm spells... which I don t really use. OH! I did find out something really cool though. From a
ygData.messageBody:
Cool. I've never had any animals help me except
for charm spells... which I don't really
use.<br><br>OH! I did find out something really cool though. From
a fairly reliable source... someone's told me that
he's killed a LOT of woodland bears and wolves. AND
he's still Amiable. At least on the Veeshan server--
there is no bear and wolf faction. Weird. I didn't
think that was all a myth-- b/c I thought I remembered
Kodiaks agroing to my character...<br><br>But either they
changed it... or I remember incorrectly. Cause I have it
worded from a recent Veeshan druid... that it doesn't
hurt him.<br><br>shooman out
